item.title: Wanna get insulted by sudo
item.description: You might have tried many Linux easters eggs for fun, but you are going to love this hack which makes `sudo` insult you. Confused what I am talking about?Â Here, take a look at this gif to get an idea of how `sudo` can insult you for typing in the incorrect password.
